page.title: 03Tourism
page.content: A clay pigeon shooting centre,the hillsides and parks provide some recreation facilities in the area,but the overwhelming movement of people is out of the area for their holiday.20 miles from here are beautiful beaches spanning the S.Wales coast. Gaining in popularity are holidays in the countryside,favourite areas being the Brecon Beacons and the Wye Valley. A survey of 17 families in the local community revealed:- 1.10 chose the seaside,7 the countryside for a day out. 2.8 had a day out more than 10 times a year 3.10 travelled by car,4 by bus and 3 by train 4.For a longer holiday 2 families chose the S.Wales coast,10 elsewhere in Britain and 3 regularly went abroad 5.10 families have 1 holiday per/year.
